Title: Relates to requiring certain information about the facility be provided to prospective maternity patients
Summary: Requires certain information about the facility and what types of plans and procedures such facility has in place to be provided to prospective maternity patients.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-j, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring certain information about the facility to be included in the informational material provided to prospective maternity patients at all hospitals and birth centers
